turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to eat some pizza for lunch.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which pizza store would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get pizza from Dominoes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of topping do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For my first pizza, I want it with just pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about your second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it to include all the different types of meat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a specialty pizza called the MeatZZa.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which kind of meats does it have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It includes ham, beef, pepperoni, and Italian sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure get me that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I believe that is all for right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have ordered 1 large pepperoni pizza and 1 large MeatZZa pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is it and how will it take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total is 15.99 and it will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. The receipt has been sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, goodbye.
